page.title: 14DR.RICHARD BUSBY
page.content: DR.Richard Busby was born in Lutton about{1605.}He lived where the old school now stands. His family donated a pulpit, the one which is in the church now. The cover got ruined and was taken to {LONG SUTTON CHURCH}for safety.It was taken there in the {1820s.}It was returned on the{23rd {of April 1985.}Dr.Busby moved to{ {London}at a young age to go to a good school. He gave money to a charity for people who couldn't afford to send their boys to a good school. Dr.Busby also became headmaster of { {Westminster}school.
